<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>43e2c750-0c9f-4421-a9a9-aad262b3f290#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A rövidlátás és a távollátás</string>
            <string language="en">Short sight and long sight</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kurzer Anblick und richtet lang aus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La vue courte et aperçoivent longtemps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A vista curta e avista por muito tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La vista corta e lungamente avvista</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύντομη θέα και μακροχρόνια θέα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La vista corta y avista de largo</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A látáshibák és korrekciójuk homorú, illetve domború lencsével</string>
            <string language="en">Visual defects and their correction with concave and convex lenses</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">látás,  szem,  rövidlátás,  távollátás,  domború,  homorú,  fókusz,  szemüveg,  lencse,  </string>
            <string language="en">sight, eye, short sight, long sight, convex, concave, focus, spectacle, lens</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sichtdefekte und ihre Korrektur mit den konkaven 
und konvexen Objektiven</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Défauts visuels et leur correction avec les 
objectifs concaves et convexes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Defeitos visuais e sua correção com as lentes 
côncavas e convexas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Difetti visivi e la loro correzione con gli 
obiettivi concavi e convessi</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οπτικές ατέλειες και η διόρθωσή τους με τους κοίλους 
και κυρτούς φακούς</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Defectos visuales y su corrección con las lentes 
cóncavas y convexas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anblick, Auge, Kurzschlußanblick, sehnt sich Anblick, 
der konvexe Körper, konkav, Fokus, Schauspiel, Objektiv</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la vue, oeil, vue de short, désirent ardemment vue, 
corps convexe, concave, foyer, spectacle, objectif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a vista, olho, vista do short, long vista, corpo 
convexo, côncavo, foco, espetáculo, lente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la vista, occhio, vista di short, desidera vista, 
convex, concavo, fuoco, spettacolo, obiettivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θέα, μάτι, σύντομη θέα, μακροχρόνια θέα, κυρτός, κοίλη, 
εστίαση, θέαμα, φακός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la vista, ojo, vista del cortocircuito, desea vista, 
cuerpo, cóncavo, foco, espectáculo, lente</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>

        </educational>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

        </lifeCycle>

        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>

            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet

        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
